Package graphics.renderer

Class UIRenderer

java.lang.Object
graphics.renderer.Renderer<UIRenderBatch>
graphics.renderer.UIRenderer
public class UIRenderer extends Renderer<UIRenderBatch>
Used to render sprites, which are rendered as Primitive.QUADs with textures. This should be used to render any renderable gameObject.
See Also:
  • UIRenderBatch
